summary: This split-screen documentary by a Malaysian director chronicles the shooting of the Indonesian film Gie (2005) in the middle of 2004, which is also when the country is undergoing its first... See full summary »
cast: Henidar Amroe|Timur Angin|Indra Birowo|Edwin|Wulan Guritno|Muhammad Ichsan|Muhammad Ichsan|Agastya Kandou|Gino Korompis|Mira Lesmana|Mandy Marahimin|John Maxwell|Jonathan Mulia|Thomas Nawilis|Sita Nursanti|Rako Prijanto|Mulyohadi Purnomo|Riri Riza|Soultan Saladin|Danny Saputra|Nicholas Saputra|Surya Saputra|Lukman Sardi|Wyan Sonatha|Didin Syamsudin|Robby Tumewu|Titien Wattimena
title: The Year of Living Vicariously
